oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Paul Catholic Church and School
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color image of St. Paul Catholic Church and St. Paul Elementary School with Our Lady of the Highway shrine at forefront.

“Shrine of Our Lady of the Highway -- St. Paul Church and School in background. Located on Shelby Drive, in the community of Whitehaven, just beyond Memphis city limits. Fr. Angelo A. Lenzi, Pastor. Ektachrome photograph by Jack M. Fletcher [printed] Donated by the estate of Mrs. Georgia Louise Price -- 2010 [handwritten]”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: St. Paul Catholic Church; churches; schools; Catholic schools; Whitehaven; South Memphis;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jack M. Fletcher
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Dexter Press, Pearl River, N.Y.; Collection processed by Angela Price
